ShapeTools

  ShapeTools is a toolkit for software configuration management [#Lampen88##1#], [#Lampen91##1#], [#Mahler88a##1#], [#Mahler90##1#], [#Mahler91##1#]. XF

uses parts of this package for version control. If the ShapeTools are not installed, the functionality of XF is restricted in some way, but the program is still working.

  • Retrieving modules
